subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are consoling themselves with platitudes about how long the season is. But those mantras ring hollow after six consecutive losing seasons, and six consecutive Novembers of making similar assurances.
snippet: The Knicks are consoling themselves with platitudes about how long the season is. But those mantras ring hollow after six consecutive losing seasons, and six consecutive Novembers of making similar assurances.
